item.title: Dotfiles
item.description: My dotfiles repository, which is more of a continuous project likely to never be done, for managing all my config files for vim, zsh, tmux, git, other dotfiles and utilities I use. Installation git clone https://github.com/nicktehrany/dotfiles cd dotfiles sudo ./install Check the .travis.yml for packages that will be installed, if not already installed. All existing links or config files will be overwritten! (Check .install.conf.yaml for all links)
